attributes.action: End negociations on the merging of Christchurch with Bournemouth and Poole
attributes.additional_details:
negociations are still happening on weather to ignore the voters and merge anyway... Christchurch is my home town, and we voted, so our vote and our voices matter. if our vote is ignored then why even vote in the first place? 
so this petition is for those people who voted and even those who may have missed the postal vote letter for whatever reason to say that the people of Christchurch have decided and there is absolutely no need for further negociations. thank you.
attributes.background: 84% of Christchurch already voted AGAINST the merge with Bournemouth and Poole in the recent postal vote.

rejection.details:
These negotiations are the responsibilities of the councils involved, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

If you'd like the Government and Parliament to reject any proposals that the councils be merged, you could start a new petition asking for that.
